note:
Water Audit California is a California public benefit corporation which advocates for the public trust through litigation, research, public policy interventions, and community engagement.

Our primarily focus is restoring California's high-impact watershed ecosystems.

This is a low-volume conversation and engagement Mastodon account. (Not a bot.)

Please direct specific media inquiries to media@waterauditca.org

Please direct legal correspondence to legal@waterauditca.org
